verses.verse: Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H8104>"Keep<s%> <S%H4941>justice,<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H6666>righteousness;<s%> for my <S%H3444>salvation<s%> is <S%H7138>near<s%> to <S%H935>come,<s%> and my <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> to be <S%H1540>revealed.<s%>

<S%H835>Blessed<s%> is the <S%H582>man<s%> who <S%H6213>does<s%> <S%H1121>this,<s%> and the son of <S%H120>man<s%> who <S%H2388>holds<s%> it <S%H8104>fast;<s%> who keeps the <S%H7676>Sabbath<s%> from <S%H2490>profaning<s%> <S%H8104>it,<s%> and keeps his <S%H3027>hand<s%> from <S%H6213>doing<s%> any <S%H7451>evil.<s%>"

Neither let <S%H1121>the<s%> <S%H5236>foreigner,<s%> who has <S%H3867>joined<s%> himself to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H559>speak,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3068>"Yahweh<s%> will <S%H914>surely<s%> <S%H914>separate<s%> me from his <S%H5971>people;<s%>" neither let the <S%H5631>eunuch<s%> <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H3002>"Behold,<s%> I am a dry <S%H6086>tree.<s%>"

For thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> "To the <S%H5631>eunuchs<s%> who <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H7676>Sabbaths,<s%> and <S%H977>choose<s%> the things that <S%H2654>please<s%> <S%H2388>me,<s%> and hold fast my <S%H1285>covenant:<s%>

to them I will <S%H5414>give<s%> in my <S%H1004>house<s%> and within my <S%H2346>walls<s%> a <S%H3027>memorial<s%> and a <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H2896>better<s%> than of <S%H1121>sons<s%> and of <S%H1323>daughters;<s%> I will <S%H5414>give<s%> them an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H8034>name,<s%> that shall not be cut <S%H3772>off.<s%>

Also <S%H1121>the<s%> <S%H5236>foreigners<s%> who <S%H3867>join<s%> themselves to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> to <S%H8334>minister<s%> to <S%H157>him,<s%> and to love the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> to be his <S%H5650>servants,<s%> everyone who <S%H8104>keeps<s%> the <S%H7676>Sabbath<s%> from <S%H2490>profaning<s%> <S%H2388>it,<s%> and holds fast my <S%H1285>covenant;<s%>

even them will I <S%H935>bring<s%> to my <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2022>mountain,<s%> and make them <S%H8055>joyful<s%> in my <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H8605>prayer:<s%> their burnt <S%H5930>offerings<s%> and their <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> shall be <S%H7522>accepted<s%> on my <S%H4196>altar;<s%> for my <S%H1004>house<s%> shall be <S%H7121>called<s%> a <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H8605>prayer<s%> for all <S%H5971>peoples.<s%>"

The <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H136>Yahweh,<s%> who <S%H6908>gathers<s%> the <S%H1760>outcasts<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H5002>says,<s%> "Yet will I <S%H6908>gather<s%> others to <S%H6908>him,<s%> besides his own who are gathered."
All you <S%H2416>animals<s%> of the <S%H7704>field,<s%> <S%H857>come<s%> to <S%H398>devour,<s%> all you <S%H2416>animals<s%> in the <S%H3293>forest.<s%>

His <S%H6822>watchmen<s%> are <S%H5787>blind,<s%> they are all without <S%H3045>knowledge;<s%> they are all <S%H483>mute<s%> <S%H3611>dogs,<s%> they <S%H3201>can't<s%> <S%H5024>bark;<s%> <S%H1957>dreaming,<s%> lying <S%H7901>down,<s%> <S%H157>loving<s%> to <S%H5123>slumber.<s%>

<S%H3611>Yes,<s%> the dogs are <S%H5794>greedy,<s%> they <S%H3045>can<s%> never <S%H3045>have<s%> <S%H7654>enough;<s%> and these are <S%H7462>shepherds<s%> who <S%H995>can't<s%> understand: they have all <S%H6437>turned<s%> to their own <S%H1870>way,<s%> each <S%H376>one<s%> to his <S%H1215>gain,<s%> from every <S%H7097>quarter.<s%>

<S%H857>"Come,<s%>" say <S%H3947>they,<s%> "I will get <S%H3196>wine,<s%> and we will <S%H5433>fill<s%> ourselves with strong <S%H7941>drink;<s%> and <S%H4279>tomorrow<s%> shall be as this <S%H4279>day,<s%> <S%H3966>great<s%> <S%H3499>beyond<s%> <S%H1419>measure.<s%>"
